inputs.name: resampledImage
inputs.description: Registration results

inputs.name: loadTransform
inputs.description: Load a transform that is immediately applied to the moving image

inputs.name: saveTransform
inputs.description: Save the transform that results from registration

inputs.name: initialization
inputs.description: Method to prime the registration process

inputs.name: registration
inputs.description: Method for the registration process

inputs.name: metric
inputs.description: Method to quantify image match

inputs.name: expectedOffset
inputs.description: Expected misalignment after initialization

inputs.name: expectedRotation
inputs.description: Expected misalignment after initialization

inputs.name: expectedScale
inputs.description: Expected misalignment after initialization

inputs.name: expectedSkew
inputs.description: Expected misalignment after initialization

inputs.name: verbosityLevel
inputs.description: Level of detail of reporting progress

inputs.name: sampleFromOverlap
inputs.description: Limit metric evaluation to the fixed image region overlapped by the moving image

inputs.name: fixedImageMask
inputs.description: Image which defines a mask for the fixed image

inputs.name: randomNumberSeed
inputs.description: Seed to generate a consistent random number sequence

inputs.name: numberOfThreads
inputs.description: Number of CPU threads to use

inputs.name: minimizeMemory
inputs.description: Reduce the amount of memory required at the cost of increased computation time

inputs.name: interpolation
inputs.description: Method for interpolation within the optimization process

inputs.name: fixedLandmarks
inputs.description: Ordered list of landmarks in the fixed image

inputs.name: movingLandmarks
inputs.description: Ordered list of landmarks in the moving image

inputs.name: rigidMaxIterations
inputs.description: Maximum number of rigid optimization iterations

inputs.name: rigidSamplingRatio
inputs.description: Portion of the image to use in computing the metric during rigid registration

inputs.name: affineMaxIterations
inputs.description: Maximum number of affine optimization iterations

inputs.name: affineSamplingRatio
inputs.description: Portion of the image to use in computing the metric during affine registration

inputs.name: bsplineMaxIterations
inputs.description: Maximum number of bspline optimization iterations

inputs.name: bsplineSamplingRatio
inputs.description: Portion of the image to use in computing the metric during BSpline registration

inputs.name: controlPointSpacing
inputs.description: Number of pixels between control points

inputs.name: fixedImage
inputs.description: Image which defines the space into which the moving image is registered

inputs.name: movingImage
inputs.description: The transform goes from the fixed image's space into the moving image's space

description: Provides rigid, affine, and BSpline registration methods via a simple GUI
name: Expert Automated Registration
label: Expert Automated Registration
